医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
KFF 健康新闻“健康怎么样？”：国会山年终混乱经过数周的艰苦谈判，参众两院的民主党人和共和党人同意了一项重要的年终卫生法案一揽子计划，其中包括针对制药公司和药品福利管理者的新规定，以及更新打击阿片类药物滥用和为下一次滥用做好准备的计划。可能发生大流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-End-of-year-chaos-on-Capitol-Hill.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/KFF-Health-News-What-the-Health-End-of-year-chaos-on-Capitol-Hill.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5592f70c-e155-47dd-833c-daf7eb98e15d Thu, 19 Dec 2024 20:02:00 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': End-of-year chaos on Capitol Hill
鸡蛋重新出现在菜单上：研究发现适量摄入鸡蛋与肥胖无关经常但适量食用鸡蛋，加上适当的烹饪方法，不会增加肥胖风险，甚至可能支持健康的脂质代谢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Eggs-are-back-on-the-menu-Study-finds-no-link-to-obesity-with-moderate-intake.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Eggs-are-back-on-the-menu-Study-finds-no-link-to-obesity-with-moderate-intake.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82d422c8-05bd-4fd7-bce2-b6aa7cdf3835 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 19:24:00 -0500 Eggs are back on the menu: Study finds no link to obesity with moderate intake
COVID-19 疫苗接种后母乳喂养是安全的，乳汁成分变化极小这项研究揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 感染如何显着改变母乳成分，而 COVID-19 疫苗接种会造成最小的短暂变化，强调了疫苗接种期间母乳喂养的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Breastfeeding-after-COVID-19-vaccination-is-safe-with-minimal-changes-to-milk-composition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Breastfeeding-after-COVID-19-vaccination-is-safe-with-minimal-changes-to-milk-composition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82005c82-b648-42ca-ac95-299ce0a4877c Thu, 19 Dec 2024 18:40:00 -0500 Breastfeeding after COVID-19 vaccination is safe, with minimal changes to milk composition
对雷特综合征早期阶段的新分子见解研究称为雷特综合征的严重发育障碍的科学家发现，早在症状出现之前就发生了一系列重要的分子变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/New-molecular-insights-into-the-early-stages-of-Rett-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/New-molecular-insights-into-the-early-stages-of-Rett-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed2fbbd4-0f11-48b9-bc95-6ced2300c159 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 13:15:46 -0500 New molecular insights into the early stages of Rett syndrome
了解酒精相关性肝病背后的机制eGastroenterology 上最新发表的一篇综述汇集了有关酒精相关性肝病 (ALD) 的最新研究，概述了其发病机制以及为更好地了解这种疾病所做的努力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Understanding-the-mechanisms-behind-alcohol- Associated-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Understanding-the-mechanisms-behind-alcohol- Associated-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bb479f2-fbdb-4537-83b0-6ab1ccd65aa6 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 12:58:51 -0500 Understanding the mechanisms behind alcohol-associated liver disease
防晒霜原型可保持皮肤凉爽并屏蔽紫外线涂抹防晒霜对于保护皮肤免受紫外线辐射的有害影响很重要，但并不能让人降温。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Sunscreen-prototype-keeps-skin-cooler-and-shields-from-UV-rays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Sunscreen-prototype-keeps-skin-cooler-and-shields-from-UV-rays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de1ac8f3-f2cf-49a1-9802-fe41f2d6dbe4 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 12:32:14 -0500 Sunscreen prototype keeps skin cooler and shields from UV rays
慢性肠道感染可能在阿尔茨海默病的进展中发挥作用亚利桑那州立大学和班纳阿尔茨海默病研究所的研究人员及其合作者发现，由一种常见病毒引起的慢性肠道感染与一部分人患阿尔茨海默病之间存在令人惊讶的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Chronic-gut-infection-may-play-role-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Chronic-gut-infection-may-play-role-in-Alzheimere28099s-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=955e64c1-85fc-4484-9a43-71289328d124 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 12:24:06 -0500 Chronic gut infection may play role in Alzheimer’s disease progression
研究显示英格兰老年人的健康状况显着改善梅尔曼公共卫生学院罗伯特·N·巴特勒哥伦比亚老龄化中心的一项新研究表明，与前几代人相比，英国老年人的健康状况显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-reveals-significant-improvements-in-the-health-of-older-adults-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-reveals-significant-improvements-in-the-health-of-older-adults-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22270215-c6c3-41ae-9025-73e51bd52816 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 12:16:12 -0500 Study reveals significant improvements in the health of older adults in England
研究揭示了 COVID-19 封锁对性别认同发展的积极影响《英国发展心理学杂志》发表的研究表明，COVID-19 大流行和封锁对跨性别和性别多元化青年的性别认同发展在很大程度上产生了积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-reveals-positive-impact-of-COVID-19-lockdown-on-gender-identity-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Study-reveals-positive-impact-of-COVID-19-lockdown-on-gender-identity-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adeb9af3-a268-42c0-af52-7bd0515f5d82 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 12:05:15 -0500 Study reveals positive impact of COVID-19 lockdown on gender identity development
将迷幻药与冥想相结合可以增强正念和神秘型超越研究人员评估了将致幻剂（即 DMT 和去氢骆驼蓬碱作为死藤水的两种活性成分）与冥想相结合是否比使用安慰剂的冥想更能增强正念、同情心、洞察力和神秘型超越。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Combining-psychedelics-with-meditation-increases-mindativity-and-mystical-type-transcendence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241219/Combining-psychedelics-with-meditation-increases-mindativity-and-mystical-type-transcendence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17bfbb2e-0f38-493c-af5c-927c0b24e586 Thu, 19 Dec 2024 11:58:00 -0500 Combining psychedelics with meditation increases mindfulness and mystical-type transcendence
